name: my second workflow
on: [push]
jobs:
   job1:
    name: First Job
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
     - name: Step one
       uses: actions/checkout@v2
     - name: Step Two
       run: echo this is the first command
   job2:
    name: Second Job
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
     - name: Step one
       uses: actions/checkout@v2
     - name: Step Two
       run: |
        echo this is the second aommand
        echo and the third command 
   job3:
    name: Third job 
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    needs: [job1, job2] 
    steps:
     - name: Step one
       run: echo job3
